text: WHAI is an adult contemporary radio station in Greenfield, Massachusetts, owned by Saga Communications. The station operates on 98.3 MHz. WHAI originated on the AM dial in 1938, adding WHAI-FM on May 15, 1948. WHAI then became WHMQ in 2001, and began to carry different programming from the FM signal. ==References== ==External links== * HAI Category:Greenfield, Massachusetts Category:Radio stations established in 1948 Category:Mass media in Franklin County, Massachusetts
title: WHAI
